channel.title: How let ppl connect my server from hamachi :)?
channel.description: hey guys :D i downloaded hamachi coz idk how to do the port forward and dunno what is router so i using hamachi can u guys tell me how do i use hamachi to connect ppl's sevrer at hamachi? thx ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: May 14, 2007, 05:04:38 AM[/size][hr]any one help me for free admin or co-owner admin for hamahi port forward for co-owner ;D thx aany way :)

item.title: How let ppl connect my server from hamachi :)?
item.dc:creator: @sokol sokol
item.description:
@sokol wrote:

Just make a network… Create new network Put
User Name: [YOUR GAME NAME]
Password: [SO PEOPLE CAN JOIN BY USING THE PASSWORD YOU PUT]
and at the top you will see your IP address… so when people join your network just give them your IP address and you hamachi need to be ON… what they will do is just go on the game and use the IP to get in on your server. I holp it helps.

Read full topic
